rooms.description: Spacious living room with large windows for ample natural light and a view of the city skyline. Vastu recommends north-west for living spaces.
Modern kitchen equipped with all necessary amenities, positioned in south-east as per Vastu norms to harness positive energy.
En-suite master bedroom overlooking a balcony. Positioned in the southwest for stability and security, following Vastu principles.
Comfortable second bedroom with ample storage space, positioned in north-east to attract positive energy for children or guests.
Luxurious ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, situated towards west to avoid disturbances during sleep.
Guest bathroom located close to the second bedroom for convenience and placed in east as per Vastu.

openings.description: Balcony providing a view of the city and natural light, situated in north-east for positive energy.
Rooftop terrace with seating area, perfect for social gatherings or relaxation. Open space as per local norms and Vastu suggestions.
